title: hello, the display of my google pixel 3a turns off and dont react .
content:
"The issue with my Pixel 3a.
Seems the phone goes into a 'sleep' mode when locked. The screen goes black and the phone becomes completely unresponsive to any screen taps, touching of the finger print reader. 
I have found only 2 solution—ñ - is plugging it into a charger or press button on/off during 10-12 seconds"
